Mr Pigibank.quote: Well good thing is I've actually found some Stamps in my desk while you were gone so at least we can start with something. So lets talk business!

Grasslands Gary.quote: Hey you're still playing! Alright so I'm a Taskmaster. I've got a bunch of tasks for you to complete while you're out there adventuring. For each one you complete you'll get points to spend!

Scripticus.quote: Wow you seriously did all of that? Here's my tro... wait you don't have any inventory space! I guess that means you have to do EVERYTHING AGAIN HAHAHA!!! Nah just kidding clear a space and talk to me again.

Town Marble.quote: But hark what be this I see? Mayhaps a glimmer of hope through yonder eyeball breaks upon which mine surface doth reflect?

Glumlee.quote: Alright kid or man or baby whatever you are behind that screen I'm gonna let you in on a secret.

Mutton.quote: A MILLION FOLLOWERS! I'm the biggest thing ever clever as a feather only getting better... forever!!! Aaand I just got cancelled on Oinkker for an Oink I posted 4 years ago ughhh.

Krunk.quote: I need you to... Hang on I'm getting a call from the game developer LavaFlame2... Hey how are you? ... Oh is that so? You haven't coded my final quest yet and you need me to stall them? I see sure I'll let them know.

Woodsman.quote: Hahahaha you should've seen your face! You can't chop down trees in this game it was just a prank my boy! This stump here? It's just a prop! Here take my spare prop as a gift for being such a good sport!

Picnic Stowaway.quote: Aahhh well that's been a full day of eating for me gonna head to sleep. I know they say the way to a blobs heart is through his stomach so I should be tellin' ya that I'm flattered but not interested.

Typhoon.quote: Hello citizen the colosseum peanut gallery is on the third floor in the upper left corner. Viewer admission is free as per Executive Order 66.

Hamish.quote: Thats uh quite a few less than a billion. But that Quest Notifier was right I'll still accept! Here's the storage chest it's super OP for a big time adventurer like you!

Promotheus.quote: The monsters here are even crazier many are references to something called 'pop culture' which I assume is some sort of Bubble Religion in their land.

Toadstall.quote: Hehe... that outta teach that old coot to not hit me off my walking stick! Please do keep bothering him from time to time he has it coming!

Stiltzcho.quote: Haha I guess it is that I just get easily sidetrack and lose focus often and instead of investigating myself for the problem I tried to blame someone else!

Funguy.quote: What you thought you were killing them? Hahaha bro chill. They're monsters they'll just respawn back home no biiiiggie! Yo but could you help clean up before headin' out?

Tiki Chief.quote: Well at least we've got you soon to be Valued Customer! Wink Wink! Sorry I had to say that out but I am wearing a mask here.

Dog Bone.quote: Look I'm not actually over the whole 'dying' thing and it's been terribly annoying to continually help promote that darn boss monster especially since they were the one who ate me!

Papua Piggea.quote: Oinko... boinko shama lama loinko... 'The pig realizes that hoarding stamps brings him no real joy and he yearns for more meaningful stampage.

TP Pete.quote: Well catch you later when you're higher level! What? Oh did I say level 60 before? I meant 160... thousand. Yea come back at Lv. 160000 and I'll probably have a new quest by then.

Telescope.quote: The engraving on the side says 'High Power Hubble Telescope capable of over 500000x magnification...'

Dazey.quote: NICE! FINALLY!!! Now I can make my costume and pretend to be Sprout! No one will ever bother me again!! Just gotta take this off and... Hey can I get some privacy you creep? Please leave the map and come back...

Sprout.quote: This is not working!! But at least I look super awesome I think I'll keep wearing these shoes! Here you can have my Merry Cherry Remedy Tshirt they broke up when I was a sapling and they'll never ever come back ever.

Cowbo Jones.quote: FINALLY I CAN GET TO WORLD 3 AND DITCH THIS DANG DESERT! Just gotta walk myself over to ya and pickpocket the crystal. Oh... right. I got no legs.

Desert Davey.quote: I'm too cool for you that's for sure... yall best come back later when you're cool like me.

Obol Altar.quote: MROWW! 'The cat jumps off in fear of the pickle. What a silly cat getting scared of a little pickl-- OH MY GOD THE PICKLE HAS EYEBALLS AAAAAH KILL IT KILL IT!!!'

Postboy Pablob.quote: You're looking for work? Cool glad to hear it. OH you mean work here at the post office? Uhm right lemme think about that...

Constructor Crow.quote: Kacaw! 'The bird awaits the return of the town gem. They're ready to restore the gem to the portal allowing travel to World 3. They look very cool in their matching blue hat and scarf.'

Centurion.quote: Stop right there civilian scum! You've violated penal code 83.7e under which King Doot demands all travelers enlist for colosseum combat!

Bandit Bob.quote: Yep that's the seasme seed alright! Drop it at the door and go get some loot! ... what? Snakenhotep? What do you mean? Did that darn lava scoundrel replace MY dungeon with some darn snake??? Well shucks...

Snake Jar.quote: MMMMmmmm what a juicy noob that was! The dumb ones are alwayssss the most ssssucculent!

Speccius.quote: Wait a minute how else could you have gotten such a weird class other than... GASP! You're HACKING! I'm reporting you straight to LavaFlame2!

XXX Cattleprod XXX.quote: DUDE I got BANNED from Lava's Discord! WTF I didn't even do anything!! I was just trying to help report the bug and I guess calling them all 'Smelly Buttfaces' when they told me it wasn't a bug triggered them or something!

Goldric.quote: Ohohoho! Don't I look maaaarvelous! Mmmmm such a shiny exterior no wonder I am the envy of all those silver spoon crybabies! Why I could go on and on and on about how wonderful I...

Carpetiem.quote: Thanks a million ya did it! Me and them Zoomer generation are great friends now they even include me in their Ticky Tocky shenanigans it's great fun! Now get off my lawn ya darn millenial!

Loominadi.quote: The deed done hope you had fun! But you must run free and leave me be where the sun I cannot see!

Wellington.quote: Hahaha! I concur old sport! However we mustn't get too down. As a matter of fact I take my hat off to the darn thing it's hiding skills are exquisite! I so suppose I'll be staying a lowly Journeyman for now.

Djonnut.quote: Sayyy have you gotten the elephant boss rare equip? It is very naiiice for the grind!

Fishpaste97.quote: Ok wow that was actually super lame... huh... guess you don't really notice how weird the things you do really are.

Scubidew.quote: Thank you so much for the fish it's perfect! A perfect fish from a perfect ocean caught by a perfect player! Have a wonderful day friend I'll see you later!

Omar Da Ogar.quote: Ok, you help me all you can! Me need no more, me hope you sail far and good!
